sentences.sContent: The software tentatively assigns each click a letter based on its frequency , then tests the message created by this assignment using statistical models of the English language .
sentences.sContent_eng: The software tentatively assigns each click a letter based on its frequency , then tests the message created by this assignment using statistical models of the English language .
sentences.sCn: 这一软件尝试性地按频率指派给每一个点击一个字母，然后用英语的统计模式测试这一指派所产生的信息。

words.tran: 试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的
用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿
